moves.10. O-O-O: White commits himself. Now the plans of each side is clear.
moves.10... b5: Black immediately launches his pawn attack.
moves.13. h4 Qc7 14. h5: White throws caution into the wind.
moves.14... b4 15. Nd5: This loses material or you could also say they are sacrificed.
moves.18... Bxh1: Black becomes greedy, oblivious of the danger posed by the light-squared bishop. 18. ... Bxd3 was in order.
Sacrificing more material. But the Black King has no escape.
moves.22... Qd8: To block the Queen with Bg5. 22. ... Rf6 23. Bc4+ Kf8 24. Bxg7+ Ke8 25. Rh8+ Bf8 (25. ... Rf8 26. Bxf8 Bxf8 27. g7) 26. Bxf6 Nxf6 27. g7
